mapper.insert: replace into player ( playerId, avatarUrl, nickName, gender, language, country, province, city ) values ( #{playerId}, #{avatarUrl}, #{nickName}, #{gender}, #{language}, #{country}, #{province}, #{city} )

insert into game ( gameId, gameOwnerId, gameOwnerAvatarUrl, gameOwnerNickName, inviteCode, killerNum, policeNum, citizenNum, state, startTime, endTime, result ) values ( #{gameId}, #{gameOwnerId}, #{gameOwnerAvatarUrl}, #{gameOwnerNickName}, #{inviteCode}, #{killerNum}, #{policeNum}, #{citizenNum}, #{state}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{result} )

insert into role ( roleId, playerId, gameId, roleType, playerNickName, playerAvatarUrl, death, deathTime, victory ) values ( #{roleId}, #{playerId}, #{gameId}, #{roleType}, #{playerNickName}, #{playerAvatarUrl}, #{death}, #{deathTime}, #{victory} )
mapper.select: select * from role where gameId=#{gameId} and playerId is null
select * from role where gameId=#{gameId} and playerId=#{playerId}
mapper.update:
update role set
playerId= #{playerId},
gameId= #{gameId},
roleType= #{roleType},
playerNickName= #{playerNickName},
playerAvatarUrl= #{playerAvatarUrl},
victory= #{victory}
roleId = #{roleId}
